questSteps.stepDescription: Speak to Maria, who can be found just south of the Silvarea limestone quarry, north-east of Varrock. Finish the dialogue.
additionalStepInformation: Before entering any door, check if there is smoke emitting from the bottom. If there is no smoke, enter the door normally. If there is smoke, right-click Peek through the door, then click the Enter Room button (the animation is irrelevant). Peeking through doors will negate ALL damage taken from the ghost.

You do not heal life points over time; only mystery meat heals you. Mystery meat restores all of your life points once eaten. The Eat Food ability does not consider mystery meat to be food, so you must click to eat it. Deaths are safe (safe for hardcore ironmen as well). The adrenaline from the Persistent Rage can be used to activate regenerate if needed.
Safe rooms save your progress. Dying, exiting the house, or lobbying reverts you to your last saved state with the items and life points that you saved with but not the time.
Temporal chests cannot be opened on the first playthrough when completing the quest itself, so ignore them.

Timers (e.g. 30 minutes remaining) are general guides for the replay challenge. Challenges cannot be completed on the first playthrough, so these should also be ignored. The timer does not pause during dialogue, so players who are trying to do the time challenge should spacebar through the dialogue as quickly as possible. However, players can reset their progress by speaking to Maria outside the mansion. The correct dialogue options are given by the speech bubble icons in the steps below.

You need to have very low latency between your computer and your RuneScape server. Otherwise, the monster will kill you even before the screen shows up, making it impossible to pass this part of the quest.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open WEST wall's SOUTH door to a safe room.
Take the raven key and clock hands on the floor.
Open SOUTH door to a safe room.
Use the clock hands on the grandfather clock to receive an eye gem.
additionalStepInformation: Search the chest to get mystery meat.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open SOUTH door after the cutscene.
Sort the pile of books for two eye gem.
additionalStepInformation: First pick any random order of books.
The order is from bottom to top.
Then use the hints given to swap out any books that are not in the correct place for books higher up on the stack.
Repeat the process for any incorrect books until the whole stack is correct.
After the book puzzle you have successfully gotten 3 eye gems.
1 from the grandfather clock.
2 from the book sort puzzle.
**Optional temporal chest: Open and search the temporal chest, requires level 10 in all skills.

questSteps.stepDescription: To Complete this Pushing Puzzle follow the steps below.
additionalStepInformation: Push the WEST statue.
Walk two steps SOUTH. Push the EAST statue.
Walk one step SOUTH. Push the WEST statue.
Push the most SOUTH-WEST statue.
Walk one step NORTH-EAST. Push the EAST statue.
Push the SOUTH statue.
Push the WEST statue.
Take the fourth eye gem from the table.

questSteps.stepDescription: Ascend the stairs to the WEST.
additionalStepInformation: temporal chest Open and search the temporal chest by the staircase, requires level 20 in all skills.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open EAST door after the cutscene.
Search Ingram's research notes for the spider key and a scroll fragment.
Unbolt and Enter the SOUTH door to the upstairs lobby.
Search the dead servant for the fifth eye gem. (Chat 1)
Talk to the faceless servant for the statue key (Chat 1).
Open SOUTH wall's WEST door (statue key).
Take the eye gem on the floor. Investigate the first statue twice.
Take the scythe key on the floor then open WEST door.
Open SOUTH wall's EAST door to a safe room.
Investigate the shrine for the grand piano key and skull key.
additionalStepInformation: Chest with Mystery Meat in the Room.

questSteps.stepDescription: Peek through the WEST door after the scream and then click "Go Back".
Open SOUTH wall's EAST door to purple area.
additionalStepInformation: An energy field shatters the windows. The purple areas inflict periodic damage.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open WEST door and enter it, go quickly through after the glass shatters.
Open WEST door to purple area.
Open WEST wall's SOUTH door to a safe area.
Search Ormod's scribblings for a scroll fragment.
Open SOUTH hidden door to purple area.
additionalStepInformation: The purple area's damage interrupts the search.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the scorched skeleton in SOUTH-EAST corner for an eye gem. Hold Spacebar to get it quickly.
Search the butler for the cleaver key.
Open NORTH wall's EAST door (cleaver key).
additionalStepInformation: Safe Room: Open NORTH wall's WEST door to a safe room.
Search the chest for mystery meat.
Open SOUTH door to Return.

questSteps.stepDescription: Turn off running. After passing the last of the broken glass turn your run back on and enter the SOUTH walls EAST door
additionalStepInformation: Walk over broken glass to avoid taking damage equal to 10% of your maximum life points. Walk to dodge the knives that are thrown from the haunted knife blocks at regular intervals.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the chest of drawers for a large pipette.
Use the large pipette on the pig to get large pipette of pig bile.
Search the furnace for human ashes.
Use the large pipette of pig bile and human ashes on the cauldron in the SOUTH-WEST corner of the room.
Use the large pipette on the cauldron to get alkaline concoction.
Use the alkaline concoction on the SOUTH door.
Investigate the frozen servant for the doll key. (Chat 11)

additionalStepInformation: Temporal Chest
Open EAST wall's SOUTH door.
Open and search the temporal chest, requires level 40 in all skills.
Open WEST door.

questSteps.stepDescription: Take the snake key from the key hooks next to the ladder.
Climb the ladder to purple area (snake key). (Chat 1)
Use the stairs in the CENTRE of the grand hall to purple area.
Take the tusks key on the floor. Talk to the Emaciated Spirit.
Open SOUTH wall's EAST door (tusks key).
Enter the trap door to the SOUTH-WEST.
Search the thief for an eye gem.
Open EAST secret door to a safe room.
Take the mother's hairbrush from the shrine of the son.
Open NORTH door to leave the statue room.
Talk to the emaciated spirit and finish the dialogue for the noose key.

additionalStepInformation: Warning: The monster will now chase you through most corridors, but not the grand hall. Contact with it will kill you. Keep going as fast as you can. You will not be hurt if you're interacting with doors or other objects.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open EAST door to purple area.
Open and climb into the cupboard.
Follow the corridor Peek through peephole along north wall and then click "Go Back".
additionalStepInformation: After entering the hidden basement, the monster and ghost cannot attack you until leaving the basement.
Optional temporal chest:
Open EAST wall's SOUTH door.
Open and search the temporal chest, requires level 30 in all skills.
Open WEST door.
Safe Room - Open NORTH wall's WEST door.
Search the chest for mystery meat if you have not yet done so.
Open SOUTH door.

questSteps.stepDescription: Move all statues except the north statue.
Stand on the MIDDLE yellow pressure plate.
Descend the stairs behind the ancient door.

additionalStepInformation: temporal chest: Open and search the temporal chest, requires level 50 in all skills.

questSteps.stepDescription: Climb down the mountaineering gear to a safe room. (Chat 1)

additionalStepInformation: Temporal chest: Open and search the temporal chest in the south, requires level 60 in all skills.
Search NORTH chest for mystery meat.

questSteps.stepDescription: Search the reception desk for Nabor's notes on insanity and the chains key.

additionalStepInformation: Open and search the temporal chest in the north-west, requires level 70 in all skills.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head to the SOUTH-WEST cell to take the dagger key on the floor.
additionalStepInformation: Open and search the temporal chest in the north-east, requires level 80 in all skills.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open WEST door to a safe room.
Ascend the stairs to ancient door.

additionalStepInformation: Safe Room : Open NORTH wall's WEST door.
Search the chest for mystery meat if you have not yet done so.
Open SOUTH door.
Warning: The monster chases you after this room.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open SOUTH door to a safe room.
Open EAST door to purple area.
Use the stairs in the CENTRE of the grand hall to purple area.
Move the servant next to the EAST door in purple area.

additionalStepInformation: The monster chases you after this room.

questSteps.stepDescription: Open SOUTH wall's WEST door (dagger key). You are safe in this room
Search Ingram's rantings for the last scroll fragment.
additionalStepInformation: Combine the fragments and Nabor's notes on insanity to make a Break Curse scroll.

questSteps.stepDescription: Run east a tile to the left of the tear in the rug and use the scroll on the beast as it enters.
additionalStepInformation: Temporal Chest lvl 90
Open EAST door.
Open and search the temporal chest, requires level 90 in all skills.
Open WEST door.

questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to the monster and choose an ending for Ormod. (Chat ~)
Open WEST door. You won't get hurt in this purple area.
Use the stairs in the CENTRE of the grand hall.
Talk to "Lenian" and finish the dialogue. At this point you get a notification saying what challenges you have completed.
Exit the house through the south door. (Chat 1)
Talk to Maria to claim your reward.
